product_overview: WebShield AI is a free, community-supported SaaS platform offering enterprise-grade cybersecurity and compliance scanning tools that democratize access to advanced security technologies, ensuring accuracy, reliability, and ease of use for individuals and teams managing multiple websites.
core_goals: Provide highly accurate automated compliance scanning for WCAG 2.1, GDPR, and HIPAA standards with real-time analysis.
Offer an extensive suite of 12+ security tools including port scanning, SSL checking, DNS analysis, and password strength evaluation accessible to users without authentication barriers.
Enable robust project management features supporting unlimited projects, team collaboration with role-based access, and continuous website monitoring.
Deliver detailed reports with compliance scores, security metrics, and actionable recommendations to help users track and improve website security and compliance.
Ensure secure and seamless user authentication and authorization using Clerk.js with JWT, including role-based access and session management.
Maintain high performance and scalability through optimized frontend and backend architectures, including caching, load balancing, and horizontal scaling.
Incorporate an AI assistant widget for user guidance and support, accessible from the homepage.
Support community engagement and funding through integrated donation systems (Ko-fi).
Provide a responsive, accessible, and user-friendly interface with dark mode, mobile-first design, and WCAG 2.1 AA compliance.
key_features: AI-Powered Compliance Scanner with 99.9% accuracy for WCAG 2.1, GDPR, and HIPAA standards, enabling real-time compliance scoring and instant analysis.
Security Engine Suite comprising over 12 tools such as Port Scanner, SSL Certificate Checker, DNS Analyzer, Password Strength Analyzer, and Hash Identifier, with several upcoming tools planned.
Project Management dashboard to create, update, delete, and monitor multiple websites, including team collaboration features with role-based permissions.
Real-time Monitoring for automatic alerts, website status tracking, and continuous health checks.
Scheduled Scans with customizable recurring scan settings to automate compliance checking.
Comprehensive Reports providing in-depth analysis, trend tracking, security metrics, and compliance scores.
Dashboard Analytics presenting real-time project overviews, performance metrics, and scan statistics.
User Authentication system integration using Clerk.js with JWT tokens and support for role-based access control.
AI Assistant Widget for intelligent user guidance and support accessible from the homepage.
Donation System integration through Ko-fi to enable user contributions and community support.
News & Updates feed delivering realtime security and compliance news within the platform.
Feedback System to collect and manage user feedback securely.
Responsive and feature-rich Navigation & Layout components with secure authentication guards and smooth scroll behavior.
Robust Loading & Error Handling with comprehensive states and user feedback mechanisms.
Reusable Modal System for various interactions including project and scan management.
Reusable UI Components and design system with a consistent and modern aesthetic.
Secure API Configuration with error handling and authentication failure management.
Strong Database Models in MongoDB for User, Project, Scan, and Monitoring data.
Real-time Notification System for user alerts and updates.
Advanced Security Middleware including secure headers, input validation, and JWT authentication.
user_flow_summary: User visits Landing Page to explore product features, pricing, and community information.
New users sign up or existing users sign in via secure Clerk.js authentication, supporting role-based access.
Authenticated users create and manage multiple projects (websites) and assign team roles for collaboration.
Users initiate compliance scans manually or schedule recurring automated scans per project.
Users access the Security Engine Suite to perform real-time security diagnostics on their websites without needing additional authentication.
Users receive real-time monitoring alerts and review website status on the Monitoring dashboard.
Users view comprehensive reports with compliance scores, security metrics, and historical trends for each project.
Users interact with the AI Assistant Widget from the homepage for help and guidance.
Users manage profile settings, preferences, and account details in the Settings page.
Users can contribute donations via the integrated Ko-fi system for community support.
Users view the News & Updates feed and provide feedback through the Feedback System.
Throughout the platform, modals facilitate easy creation, editing, and deletion of projects, websites, and scheduled scans, ensuring a smooth UX.
validation_criteria: AI-Powered Compliance Scanner must achieve 99.9% accuracy in detecting compliance issues according to WCAG 2.1, GDPR, and HIPAA standards.
Security Engine Suite tools must be fully functional and accessible without requiring user authentication where applicable.
User authentication must securely handle JWT tokens, support role-based access, and prevent 400 error responses and deprecated property issues.
All project and scan-related APIs must support create, read, update, and delete (CRUD) operations with proper authorization checks.
Real-time monitoring services must send alerts reliably and display up-to-date website status information.
Scheduled scans must trigger as per customizable user schedules without authentication blocking errors.
Comprehensive report pages should correctly display compliance scores, security metrics, and actionable recommendations with no authentication issues.
The AI Assistant Widget should be available from the homepage and handle errors gracefully.
Loading and error handling components must cover all critical UI states, including global errors, 404 pages, and authentication timeouts.
Donation button functionality and navigation must work seamlessly with Ko-fi integration.
UI components and modals must be reusable, responsive, and prevent authentication blocking.
Security middleware must enforce content security policies, CORS, input validation, and JWT authentication with robust error handling.
Performance optimizations including code splitting, caching, database indexing, and load balancing must be implemented and tested for scalability.
